short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify uploading copied screenshots, images, files from your clipboard to webpages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy-n-Paste is a lightweight Chromium extension to simplify uploading copied screenshots, images, files from your clipboard. No need to save as files. Similar to Opera Easy Files.

â“ How to use
1. Copy images/files OR take a screenshot
2. Click on the website's attach/upload file button (or similar)
3. Extension overlay pops up to preview and attach from clipboard

ğŸš€ Features
â–ª Completely free and open source!
â–ª Lightweight â€“ Less than 0.03MB!
â–ª Clean & Simple GUI â€“ 1 interface only!
â–ª Screenshot upload â€“ Simply snap and upload!
â–ª Copy and Paste (Ctrl+V supported) â€“ Copy multiple images or files anywhere!
â–ª Drag and Drop
â–ª Wide cross-site compatibility â€“ Works on popular websites (Google Docs, Hugging Face, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, and more)!


ğŸ” Full Privacy
We do not collect any data or usage information.
